creditline: Gift of Kenneth and Sally Leafman Appelbaum
description: stemmed cup on 4 feet on base; reclining applied figure on base connected by spiraling wire to 5 angels on stem and cup; 1 additional angel on cup; relief applied Hebrew text on cup; balls on cup and base
markings: on bottom,incised: [1/36 Silver 960/ Michael Ende]; on bottom applied: [ (rampant lion holding a pitcher-?-over a sack-?)]
title: Kiddush (sanctification) cup
